Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,1 +1,11 @@
 <?php
+
+$host = 'localhost';
+$user = 'root';
+$pass = 'root';
+$dbname = 'mBlog';
+
+$pdo = new PDO('mysql:host=' . $host . ';dbname=' . $dbname . ';charset=utf8', $user, $pass, [
+        PDO::ATTR_ERRMODE => PDO::ERRMODE_EXCEPTION,
+        PDO::ATTR_DEFAULT_FETCH_MODE => PDO::FETCH_ASSOC,
+]);
\ No newline at end of file
